Subject: Re: [junit] what are the limitations and strengths of JUnit?

Mime-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="us-ascii"; format=flowed
From: Jim Cheesman <jchees@...>

At 12:57 PM 09/05/01, you wrote:

Couldn't you have put all of your questions in one message, instead of four?


>what are the limitations and strengths of JUnit?

Strengths:
unit testing classes
easy to use/set up

Weaknesses:
black-box testing (try httpunit (linked from junit.org) instead)
unit testing server-side components (try cactus (at jakarta-apache > commons)).

To really find the limitations and strengths, however, I suggest you try it 
out.



Jim

subject: Re: [junit] what are the limitations and strengths of JUnit?
